name: Input Validation
summary: Add client and server-side validation to form inputs
description: Implement proper input validation to prevent invalid data from being submitted and provide helpful error messages to users.

contextVariables.description: The type of form being validated

examples.fintech: Luhn algorithm check for card numbers

scenarioTemplate.ticketDescription: Currently the {formType} accepts any input. We need to add validation for {fieldType} to ensure {businessRule}. Invalid inputs should show clear error messages.
acceptanceCriteria: Invalid inputs show descriptive error messages
Form cannot be submitted with invalid data
Validation runs on blur and on submit
Server also validates (don't trust client only)
technicalRequirements: Use Zod or Yup for schema validation
Disable submit button when form is invalid

blanks.hint: Zod has a built-in method for validating email format

codeExercise.successMessage: The .email() validator ensures proper email format!

hints: Consider what makes a valid email format
Zod provides built-in validators for common patterns
Error messages should help users fix the problem
